channel.title: Siberium RSPS - A truly unique experience
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.siberiumrsps.com/assets/images/logonoglow2.png[/img] Note: this is a direct copy-paste from R-S. I'm one of the devs so :P
[B]Siberium 474[/B] Siberium is a 474 project, we have been working on this for a few weeks now, adding multiple features trying to have as much unique content as possible.
Register on the forums here: -Needs approval-
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/d8438705031f39f820dd0f5a78dc3a91.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[Spoiler=Developers] [CENTER] Myself Hope Sk8rdude461 Alejandro [/CENTER] [/Spoiler] [Spoiler=Updates] [b]16/5/14[/b] - Started Hunter base - Added Weaponry (See section in crafting skill guide) - Finished Pottery base - Started Pottery base - Added glassblowing base. Going to redo it. Just wanted a mockup. - Fixed skill guides. Clicking the tabs in each guide didn't work. - Made smithing require a hammer. - Made it so you cannot open any interface while in combat. - Finished new emote handler. - Fixed hair showing through wig - Added working lumbridge stairs - Modified lumbridge doors so all doors are wooden and not stone.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/8OoKG.jpg[/img]
[B]7/5/14[/B] - Experience lamps - The herblore icon was offset by a few pixels to the top. I've moved it back down to the center-ish area. - Spellbooks - While I'm not totally finished with the spellbooks, I rewrote the system that handles how your player switches books. Before it was messy and handled of multiple classes and it's now all handled in one. - Skill guides - I have also rewrote how the guides are opened as well. All guides are working and display the correct information. - Barrows - Before when you went into the crypts, it would draw 5 or 6 funky diagonal lines over the map. Now it totally disables the map as it should. - Teleports - All spell teleports have been rewrote. You now need runes (hover the spell to see what ones) in order to teleport. There was a small bug where you could spam click the buttons and waste your runes, but that is no longer an issue.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MK5izqP.png[/img]
[B]3/5/14[/B] - Player Accounts now save 2x faster (not noticeable to the player, but very noticeable in terms of system usage). - Players can now correctly add a person to their ignore list. The ignore feature also now works (player won't be able to send a message to you). - Have to add public chat denying still. - Recently re-did clan chat, so that should be running smoother and faster (in terms of updating players and information displayed on the interface). - The entire settings tab now works. Players can properly choose split chat, run toggle, chat effects, and mouse button preferences. - Your split chat preference now saves to the player profile. - All Skillcape emotes now work. If you're walking, the system will properly stop your player to perform the emote. - Changed the text in the quest tab to green (more of a welcoming feeling haha). - Fixed the issue where players would not receive 250k from the lumbridge guide if their inventory was full. - Fixed up item switching. Now proper and efficient. - All orbs (HP, Prayer, and Run) now decrease (the orb filling) as your points go down. - You can toggle your run on/off simply by clicking the orb. - Hover texts have been added to the rank and teleport button. - The split chat saving feature will be operational. - Hover texts on the quest tab have been changed (so you don't see quest names). - You can now right click a player's name in the public chat or private chat, and if they're your friend, you can choose to "Message" them back.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/0724f8bb5f4b8014fc874ec7fbdb429d.png[/img]
[B]27/4/14[/B] Fishing: - Re-wrote the system. - System is now properly timed and grants users a catch based on how high their level is above the level of fish they're catching. For example, if a player's fishing level is 70 and they're trying to catch lobster, which is level 40 requirement, they have a level 30 difference, which means they'll catch lobster more often. - Each catch (both failed and successful catches) have a chance to yield a seaweed. - Future updates include random moving fishing spots & random caskets.
Prayer: - Re-wrote the altar and bone burying system. - Proper animations, timing, and graphics on the altar. - Altar grants 2x experience over burying the bone.
[B]25/4/14[/B] - Lists categories and 12 teleports corresponding to each category. - Once you click a category, it will save to your profile. Each time you re-open the interface, the category will automatically be on the previous one you used to teleport in the past. Works even if you log out. - The icon to access this system is located right under the run orb, as seen by the scroll.
[b]19/4/14[/b] The home area is nearing completion. [ul][*]Added all doors, objects, and most village npcs that relate to our home. [*]Shops, essential npc's and attackable monsters were moved appropriately to the new home.[/ul]
Searchables system: [ul][*]You can now search any object that has the "Search" option across the world! This includes crates, bookcases, drawers, ect. [*]Each searchable has a random chance of finding loot. If loot is found, the crate has a reset time before any player has a *chance* of using it again. [*]Rewards are based on luck. You will get 3 random items of different quantities for every successful search.[/ul]
Stairs & Ladders: [ul][*]I've added an all new stairs and ladders system that's efficient. If a staircase or ladder is missing, a message should pop up that says "Report stairs/ladder to a staff member" so that we may add it.[/ul]
Intoxication: [ul][*]Since there's a bar in town, we thought we'd add a bartender along with a few alcoholic beverages. ;) [*]Drinking enough alcohol will raise your intoxication level and eventually make your player walk 'drunk'. See media below. [*]The more alcohol you drink, the longer it will last. [*]Future additions to this content include: intoxication meter, temporary loss of certain stats, and uncontrollable walking.[/ul]
[b]17/4/14[/b] - Doors fixed up the original door system included in the source so that it's more efficient & the features are far better. Unlike before, a majority of doors now work in Siberium. The system however doesn't account for all of the doors across the world. There's a more than likely chance that you'll run into a door that doesn't work properly. Please report the door on the forums along with the location. - 1 Click door operations. The old system had it so that you would click to walk up to a door, but would have to click an additional time to open the door. We've integrated it all into 1 click. - Region door updating fixed. An old error causing the doors not to reload upon switching regions has been fixed. - Bank Deposit Box: Fully functional, all features of the box supported. Pictures below.
[B]14/4/14[/B] Welcome to the Siberium "Vote 4 Rewards" it is a very simple and easy to use feature. The system was made with simplicity in mind.
- The interface below is self-explanatory. You click the button at the bottom which will redirect you to a RuneLocus page that will ask you to enter a captcha code, then click "Vote". Then you're done! Our servers will automatically process and validate your vote and add it to your account whether it's online or offline. - The interface will also tell you if Runelocus will allow you to vote (since it's only allowed every 12 hours). - The server checks for votes every 1-5 minutes, allowing the server to function properly whilst under heavy load.
[B]12/4/14[/B] Introducing the Nobility Ranking System. It's very simple and the picture is self-explanatory, to obtain the next nobility rank, you have to complete the 5 challenges listed. It changes for every rank and gets extremely hard the more ranks you gain. At the moment, there's no benefits to each rank, but we're 100% positively looking to implement benefits for each rank.
Upon the beta release, there will be 3 obtainable nobility ranks for players to 'have at'. Upon the real release, there will be 5 ranks to obtain. In the future, shortly after the real release, we're planning to have a total of 16 nobility ranks that a player can obtain.
- Nobility rank shows up on the interface along with where the world map button used to be. - You can also click the rank (world map), to access the interface.
- Running orb & run toggle box now properly unhighlights when your energy depletes. - Fletching is roughly 80% complete. Need to add bow-stringing support & make # interfaces for fletching headless arrows and bolts.
[B]9/4/14[/B] - Added high scores ready for release when it comes around. - Began donation system - Cleaned source - Repackaged source
[B]7/4/14[/B] - Bought IPB license - Set up forums - Added a portion to the login screen that shows the server status and number of players online.
[B]4/4/14[/B] - New login box added - New client background added - New client frame added
[B]26/03/14[/B] - Clan Chat (adds new users auto) - 100% clipping - Reworked formulas - Basic teleports - All added boss work - Godwars with kill count to enter boos rooms - Duel arena with working restrictions - Barrows with working kill count and rewards room - Castle wars (nearly finished) [/Spoiler] [Spoiler=Media] [CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sW2XuZR.gif[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/8OoQc[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/8OoKG[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/8OoJ4[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/f60d56980bc4d52efc07de4a15c247dc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/b01f6173887b89b359cf217f43a3f0dd.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/84c918176d7d0bab754e39ab89e18b49.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a3cd0211b976b1794ad6d55609688165.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1fa7f14f2802136b2db359d1f8689c4b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WQI6DLP.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VZOR2fr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/b3392df69736e53d9f92706257fd98e5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AfsCnya.png[/img] [/CENTER] [/Spoiler]

16/5/14

  • Started Hunter base
  • Added Weaponry (See section in crafting skill guide)

Edit: So hunter is coming along nicely.

item.title: Siberium RSPS - A truly unique experience
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[CENTER]

Note: this is a direct copy-paste from R-S. I’m one of the devs so

[B]Siberium 474[/B]
Siberium is a 474 project, we have been working on this for a few weeks now,
adding multiple features trying to have as much unique content as possible.

Register on the forums here: -Needs approval-


[/CENTER]

[Spoiler=Developers]
[CENTER]
Myself
Hope
Sk8rdude461
Alejandro
[/CENTER]
[/Spoiler]
[Spoiler=Updates]
16/5/14

  • Started Hunter base
  • Added Weaponry (See section in crafting skill guide)
  • Finished Pottery base
  • Started Pottery base
  • Added glassblowing base. Going to redo it. Just wanted a mockup.
  • Fixed skill guides. Clicking the tabs in each guide didn’t work.
  • Made smithing require a hammer.
  • Made it so you cannot open any interface while in combat.
  • Finished new emote handler.
  • Fixed hair showing through wig
  • Added working lumbridge stairs
  • Modified lumbridge doors so all doors are wooden and not stone.

[B]7/5/14[/B]

  • Experience lamps - The herblore icon was offset by a few pixels to the top. I’ve moved it back down to the center-ish area.
  • Spellbooks - While I’m not totally finished with the spellbooks, I rewrote the system that handles how your player switches books. Before it was messy and handled of multiple classes and it’s now all handled in one.
  • Skill guides - I have also rewrote how the guides are opened as well. All guides are working and display the correct information.
  • Barrows - Before when you went into the crypts, it would draw 5 or 6 funky diagonal lines over the map. Now it totally disables the map as it should.
  • Teleports - All spell teleports have been rewrote. You now need runes (hover the spell to see what ones) in order to teleport. There was a small bug where you could spam click the buttons and waste your runes, but that is no longer an issue.

[B]3/5/14[/B]

  • Player Accounts now save 2x faster (not noticeable to the player, but very noticeable in terms of system usage).
  • Players can now correctly add a person to their ignore list. The ignore feature also now works (player won’t be able to send a message to you). - Have to add public chat denying still.
  • Recently re-did clan chat, so that should be running smoother and faster (in terms of updating players and information displayed on the interface).
  • The entire settings tab now works. Players can properly choose split chat, run toggle, chat effects, and mouse button preferences.
  • Your split chat preference now saves to the player profile.
  • All Skillcape emotes now work. If you’re walking, the system will properly stop your player to perform the emote.
  • Changed the text in the quest tab to green (more of a welcoming feeling haha).
  • Fixed the issue where players would not receive 250k from the lumbridge guide if their inventory was full.
  • Fixed up item switching. Now proper and efficient.
  • All orbs (HP, Prayer, and Run) now decrease (the orb filling) as your points go down.
  • You can toggle your run on/off simply by clicking the orb.
  • Hover texts have been added to the rank and teleport button.
  • The split chat saving feature will be operational.
  • Hover texts on the quest tab have been changed (so you don’t see quest names).
  • You can now right click a player’s name in the public chat or private chat, and if they’re your friend, you can choose to “Message” them back.

[B]27/4/14[/B]
Fishing:

  • Re-wrote the system.
  • System is now properly timed and grants users a catch based on how high their level is above the level of fish they’re catching. For example, if a player’s fishing level is 70 and they’re trying to catch lobster, which is level 40 requirement, they have a level 30 difference, which means they’ll catch lobster more often.
  • Each catch (both failed and successful catches) have a chance to yield a seaweed.
  • Future updates include random moving fishing spots & random caskets.

Prayer:

  • Re-wrote the altar and bone burying system.
  • Proper animations, timing, and graphics on the altar.
  • Altar grants 2x experience over burying the bone.

[B]25/4/14[/B]

  • Lists categories and 12 teleports corresponding to each category.
  • Once you click a category, it will save to your profile. Each time you re-open the interface, the category will automatically be on the previous one you used to teleport in the past. Works even if you log out.
  • The icon to access this system is located right under the run orb, as seen by the scroll.

19/4/14
The home area is nearing completion.
[ul][]Added all doors, objects, and most village npcs that relate to our home.
[]Shops, essential npc’s and attackable monsters were moved appropriately to the new home.[/ul]

Searchables system:
[ul][]You can now search any object that has the “Search” option across the world! This includes crates, bookcases, drawers, ect.
[]Each searchable has a random chance of finding loot. If loot is found, the crate has a reset time before any player has a chance of using it again.
[*]Rewards are based on luck. You will get 3 random items of different quantities for every successful search.[/ul]

Stairs & Ladders:
[ul][*]I’ve added an all new stairs and ladders system that’s efficient. If a staircase or ladder is missing, a message should pop up that says “Report stairs/ladder to a staff member” so that we may add it.[/ul]

Intoxication:
[ul][]Since there’s a bar in town, we thought we’d add a bartender along with a few alcoholic beverages.
[]Drinking enough alcohol will raise your intoxication level and eventually make your player walk ‘drunk’. See media below.
[]The more alcohol you drink, the longer it will last.
[]Future additions to this content include: intoxication meter, temporary loss of certain stats, and uncontrollable walking.[/ul]

17/4/14

  • Doors fixed up the original door system included in the source so that it’s more efficient & the features are far better.
    Unlike before, a majority of doors now work in Siberium. The system however doesn’t account for all of the doors across the world. There’s a more than likely chance that you’ll run into a door that doesn’t work properly. Please report the door on the forums along with the location.
  • 1 Click door operations. The old system had it so that you would click to walk up to a door, but would have to click an additional time to open the door. We’ve integrated it all into 1 click.
  • Region door updating fixed. An old error causing the doors not to reload upon switching regions has been fixed.
  • Bank Deposit Box:
    Fully functional, all features of the box supported. Pictures below.

[B]14/4/14[/B]
Welcome to the Siberium “Vote 4 Rewards” it is a very simple and easy to use feature. The system was made with simplicity in mind.

  • The interface below is self-explanatory. You click the button at the bottom which will redirect you to a RuneLocus page that will ask you to enter a captcha code, then click “Vote”. Then you’re done! Our servers will automatically process and validate your vote and add it to your account whether it’s online or offline.
  • The interface will also tell you if Runelocus will allow you to vote (since it’s only allowed every 12 hours).
  • The server checks for votes every 1-5 minutes, allowing the server to function properly whilst under heavy load.

[B]12/4/14[/B]
Introducing the Nobility Ranking System. It’s very simple and the picture is self-explanatory, to obtain the next nobility rank, you have to complete the 5 challenges listed. It changes for every rank and gets extremely hard the more ranks you gain. At the moment, there’s no benefits to each rank, but we’re 100% positively looking to implement benefits for each rank.

Upon the beta release, there will be 3 obtainable nobility ranks for players to ‘have at’.
Upon the real release, there will be 5 ranks to obtain.
In the future, shortly after the real release, we’re planning to have a total of 16 nobility ranks that a player can obtain.

  • Nobility rank shows up on the interface along with where the world map button used to be.

  • You can also click the rank (world map), to access the interface.

  • Running orb & run toggle box now properly unhighlights when your energy depletes.

  • Fletching is roughly 80% complete. Need to add bow-stringing support & make # interfaces for fletching headless arrows and bolts.

[B]9/4/14[/B]

  • Added high scores ready for release when it comes around.
  • Began donation system
  • Cleaned source
  • Repackaged source

[B]7/4/14[/B]

  • Bought IPB license
  • Set up forums
  • Added a portion to the login screen that shows the server status and number of players online.

[B]4/4/14[/B]

  • New login box added
  • New client background added
  • New client frame added

[B]26/03/14[/B]

  • Clan Chat (adds new users auto)
  • 100% clipping
  • Reworked formulas
  • Basic teleports
  • All added boss work
  • Godwars with kill count to enter boos rooms
